nodes.text: The Tendo system was a star system located within the Quess sector of the Mid Rim and the Trailing Sectors. It contained several planets that were frequented by the Riorian murderer Stalnus. The criminal was known to have a network of contacts in the system who informed the Riorian whenever law enforcement agents or bounty hunters arrived to try and arrest him. In 7 ABY, the Tendo system was mentioned by the New Republic General Airen Cracken within the datafile Wanted by Cracken in an entry dedicated to Stalnus.

The Tendo system was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Wanted by Cracken, which was written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square N-17.
